errors.503: Operation cannot be performed: service unavailable

errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: A least one upper case letter

KSignupAlert.TITLE: Your email address has not been verified, please check your mailbox
KSignupAlert.HELP_LABEL: Why should I verify my email address ?
KSignupAlert.HELP_TEXT: Verifying your email address improves the security of your account. Once you have verified your email address, both your password and access to your email account are required in order to make any changes to your account credentials, such as your password and contact email address. This helps further protect your account from being stolen by a potential phisher.
KSignupAlert.EMAIL_LABEL: I never received the verification email, what should I do ?
KSignupAlert.EMAIL_TEXT: If you do not receive your signup verification email and you are running a Spam filter, check and make sure the message has not been filtered as spam. Please try adding email-notifications@kalisio.com to your contacts or trusted senders list within your email client and attempt to re-verify your email address. You can also click the button below and we'll send you the email again.

KVerifySignup.TITLE: Email adress verification
KVerifySignup.MESSAGE: Please wait while verifying your email address
KVerifySignup.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your email address {{email}} has been verified
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_NOTHING_TO_VERIFY: Your email address has already been verified
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_BAD_PARAMS: Your email address has already been verified or your account has been removed
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_VERIFY_EXPIRED: The delay to verify your email address has expired, please resend the verification email with the link below
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Your email address has not been verified
